question: Enumerate every distinct top-level window visible in the screenshot. For each window: app/product name, host-vs-VDI context, and whether it is fully visible or partially occluded. Return the list in front-to-back z-order.
improved: Window detection; host/VDI attribution; occlusion + z-order reasoning
risked: Merging overlapping windows; misclassifying VDI-contained UI as host; wrong z-order
enforcement_location: Capture pipeline -> window segmentation + compositor/z-order logic
regression_detection: Golden JSON: stable window count + ordered list; diff on name/context/order/occluded

question: Which window has keyboard/input focus? Provide 2 pieces of visual evidence (e.g., highlighted title bar, selected row, caret) and include the exact highlighted text for each evidence item.
risked: Incorrect focus under dark themes; false positives from hover/selection states
enforcement_location: UI-state inference layer (focus heuristics + highlight detection)
regression_detection: Assert (focused_window_id, evidence_text[]) matches baseline; require 2 evidence items

question: In the VDI Outlook reading pane showing a task/incident email: extract (a) email subject, (b) sender display name, (c) sender email domain only (do not return the full address), and (d) the labels of the primary action buttons in the embedded task card.
improved: Small-font OCR; email header parsing; secure redaction behavior
risked: OCR dropouts on dense UI; leaking full email address; missing embedded-card buttons
enforcement_location: OCR + layout parser; PII redaction/sanitization stage
regression_detection: Exact-string checks for subject/button labels; domain-only validation (reject '@' local-part leakage)

question: From that same task/incident view, extract the complete 'Record Activity' timeline: each entry’s timestamp (including timezone if shown) and its associated text, in the same top-to-bottom order displayed.
improved: Timeline extraction; timestamp parsing; multi-line association
risked: Dropping one of the timeline rows; mixing timestamp with wrong activity text
enforcement_location: Structured extraction -> timeline parser (row grouping + ordering)
regression_detection: Golden list length + exact text per row; stable ordering; fail if any row missing

question: From the 'Details' section in the same VDI task/incident view, extract all visible field labels and their values as key-value pairs (include fields that are present-but-empty as empty strings). Preserve the on-screen ordering.
risked: Mis-pairing labels to wrong values; skipping empty fields; unstable ordering
regression_detection: Schema check + ordered-keys snapshot test; verify empty fields retained

question: In the VDI right-side calendar/schedule pane: extract the displayed month+year, the currently selected date, and then list the first 5 visible scheduled items (top-to-bottom) with start time + title.
improved: Calendar widget parsing; dense list OCR; selection-state recognition
risked: Wrong selected day; time/title misalignment; skipping items due to low contrast
regression_detection: Golden month/year + selected-date + first-5 (time,title) tuples; strict row count

question: In the Slack DM window: transcribe the last two visible messages as (sender, timestamp, exact text). Also describe what the embedded image thumbnail depicts in 1 sentence (do not infer beyond what is visible).
improved: Chat transcript extraction; timestamp association; image-thumbnail description
risked: Timestamp/sender mismatch; partial message transcription; hallucinated thumbnail details
enforcement_location: Chat UI parser + captioning module with 'visible-only' constraint
regression_detection: Exact text match for the 2 messages; thumbnail description must reference visible UI elements only

question: In the upper-left dev note/terminal-summary window: extract the full 'What changed' section (each line), the 'Files:' list, and the exact 'Tests:' command shown.
improved: Code-oriented OCR; section boundary detection; path/command extraction
risked: Missing section headers; dropping file paths; truncating command-line text
regression_detection: Golden sections: exact header+lines; exact file-path list; exact test command string

question: In the console/log window that contains both red and green text: extract all visible lines and classify each line by its rendered color (red/green/other). Return counts per color and the full text of every red line.
improved: Color-aware text extraction; error-line isolation; count accuracy
risked: Losing color classification; merging wrapped lines incorrectly; miscounting
enforcement_location: Renderer-aware OCR (color sampling per line) + line-wrapping logic
regression_detection: Assert (count_red,count_green,count_other) + exact list of red-line strings matches baseline

question: For each visible browser window in the screenshot: extract the active tab title, the address-bar hostname (hostname only), and the count of visible tabs in that window’s tab strip.
improved: Browser chrome parsing; tab-title OCR; hostname normalization; multi-window disambiguation
risked: Mixing tab strips between windows; wrong active tab; capturing full URL instead of hostname
enforcement_location: Browser-UI parser (tab strip + address bar) + URL normalizer
regression_detection: Golden per-window tuple: (active_title, hostname, visible_tab_count); validate hostname format (no path/query)
